name: Pulsar (itch) (Camden Cecrle)
description:
Pulsar is a 1 v 1 local multiplayer top-down arena shooter. The game was made in a 24 hour period using only Steam controllers for input. There was a lot of on screen keyboard typing. (including this.) Altho we made the game with Steam controllers we recommend playing with xbox controllers.

Credits -

Programming

 David Warford

Art

Camden Cecrle
